channel.title: CVE Feed for Hikvision -- HikCentral Professional

item.title: CVE-2024-47487|2024-10-18T08:32:45.182Z -- hikvision -- hikcentral%20professional
item.description: There is a SQL injection vulnerability in some HikCentral Professional versions. This could allow an authenticated user to execute arbitrary SQL queries.
